Welcome to my new site!22 Dec 2013

Firstly thanks for stopping by! I had wanted to create a personal site for a while and after reading this post by Ryan Seys I finally bit the bullet. The main reason for building the site is so that I can use it as a tool to record what I have learnt, hopefully improve my written communication skills and show case the projects that I have been working.

Hi I'm Brent Parish, a passionate developer from Australia.

You can contact me at: hello@brentparish.com, follow me on twitter or see what I have been up to on github.
